title: Amazon Music gets in on price hikes with new $9 monthly fee
content:
In recent months, some subscription services have taken advantage of fee raises, catching some users by surprise. A prime example is, well, Amazon Prime and its recent price change. Additionally, it seems Amazon Music is the latest service to raise the price, upping the monthly fee by one dollar.

moreâ€¦

The post Amazon Music gets in on price hikes with new $9 monthly fee appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Amazon Music has taken to raising it's monthly price to a new $9. That still leaves it as one of the cheapest options available.
